subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: With a dislocated left elbow, Celtics guard Rajon Rondo remained in the game and led Boston to an improbable victory that saved them from an 0-3 series deficit.
snippet: With a dislocated left elbow, Celtics guard Rajon Rondo remained in the game and led Boston to an improbable victory that saved them from an 0-3 series deficit.
